title: GDP of New Brunswick , Canada 2000 to 2018
yAxis: GDP in million chained 2012 Canadian dollars
summary: In general GDP in million chained 2012 Canadian dollars has rose over the Year.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2003 and 2004.
Maximum GDP in million chained 2012 Canadian dollars, about 29546.0 was reported at Year 2016
The lowest GDP in million chained 2012 Canadian dollars, of value 26653.8 was reported at Year 2002
min_summary: Overall GDP in million chained 2012 Canadian dollars has increased over the Year.
